balki goya maare josh ke phat padegee jab usamen (unaka) koee giroh daala jaega to unase daaroge jahannum poochhega kya tumhaare paas koee daraane vaala paigambar nahin aaya tha
vah kahenge ho hamaare paas daraane vaala to zaroor aaya tha magar hamane usako jhuthala diya aur kaha ki khuda ne to kuchh naazil hee nahin kiya tum to badee (gaharee) gumaraahee mein (pade) ho
aur (ye bhee) kahenge ki agar (unakee baat) sunate ya samajhate tab to (aaj) dozakhiyon mein na hote
garaz vah apane gunaah ka iqaraar kar lenge to dozakhiyon ko khuda kee rahamat se dooree hai
beshak jo log apane paravaradigaar se bedekhe bhaale darate hain unake lie magapherat aur bada bhaaree ajr hai
aur tum apanee baat chhipakar kaho ya khullam khulla vah to dil ke bhedon tak se khoob vaaqif hai
bhala jisane paida kiya vah to bekhabar aur vah to bada baareekabeen vaaqifakaar hai
vahee to hai jisane zameen ko tumhaare lie naram (va hamavaar) kar diya to usake ataraaf va javaanib mein chalo phiro aur usakee (dee huee) rozee khao

aur phir usee kee taraph qabr se uth kar jaana hai kya tum us shakhsh se jo aasamaan mein (hukoomat karata hai) is baat se bekhauf ho ki tumako zameen mein dhaisa de phir vah ekabaaragee ulat pulat karane lage
ya tum is baat se bekhauph ho ki jo aasamaan mein (saltanat karata) hai ki tum par patthar bharee ondhee chalae to tumhen anaqareeeb hee maaloom ho jaega ki mera daraana kaisa hai
aur jo log unase pahale the unhone jhuthalaaya tha to (dekho) ki meree naakhushee kaisee thee

kya un logon ne apane saron par chidiyon ko udate nahin dekha jo paron ko phailae rahatee hain aur samet letee hain ki khuda ke siva unhen koee roke nahin rah sakata beshak vah har cheez ko dekh raha hai

bhala khuda ke siva aisa kaun hai jo tumhaaree fauj banakar tumhaaree madad kare kaafir log to dhokhe hee (dhokhe) mein hain bhala khuda agar apanee (dee huee) rozee rok le to kaun aisa hai jo tumhen rizaq de
magar ye kuphfaar to sarakashee aur nafarat (ke bhanvar) mein phanse hue hain bhala jo shakhsh aundhe munh ke baal chale vah jyaada hidaayat yaaphta hoga
ya vah shakhsh jo seedha baraabar raahe raast par chal raha ho (ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda to vahee hai jisane tumako nit naya paida kiya
aur tumhaare vaaste kaan aur onkh aur dil banae (magar) tum to bahut kam shukr ada karate ho
kah do ki vahee to hai jisane tumako zameen mein phaila diya aur usee ke saamane jama kie jaoge
aur kuphfaar kahate hain ki agar tum sachche ho to (aakhir) ye vaayada kab (poora) hoga
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki (isaka) ilm to bas khuda hee ko hai aur main to sirph saaf saaf (azaab se) daraane vaala hoon
to jab ye log use kareeb se dekh lenge (khauph ke maare) kaaphiron ke chehare bigad jaenge aur unase kaha jaega ye vahee hai jisake tum khavaastagaar the
(ai rasool) tum kah do bhala dekho to ki agar khuda mujhako aur mere saathiyon ko halaak kar de ya ham par raham pharamae to kaafiron ko dardanaak azaab se kaun panaah dega

tum kah do ki vahee (khuda) bada raham karane vaala hai jis par ham eemaan lae hain aur hamane to usee par bharosa kar liya hai to anaqareeb hee tumhen maaloom ho jaega ki kaun sareehee gumaraahee mein (pada) hai
ai rasool tum kah do ki bhala dekho to ki agar tumhaara paanee zameen ke andar chala jae kaun aisa hai jo tumhaare lie paanee ka chashma baha lae
noon qalam kee aur us cheez kee jo likhatee hain (usakee) qasam hai
ki tum apane paravaradigaar ke fazal (va karam) se deevaane nahin ho
aur tumhaare vaaste yaqeenan vah ajr hai jo kabhee khatm hee na hoga
aur beshak tumhaare ekhalaaq bade aala darje ke hain
to anaqareeb hee tum bhee dekhoge aur ye kuphfaar bhee dekh lenge
ki tumamen deevaana kaun hai
beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar inase khoob vaaqif hai jo usakee raah se bhatake hue hain aur vahee hidaayat yaaphta logon ko bhee khoob jaanata hai
to tum jhuthalaane vaalon ka kahana na maanana
vah log ye chaahate hain ki agar tum naramee ekhteyaar karo to vah bhee naram ho jaen
aur tum (kaheen) aise ke kahane mein na aana jo bahut qasamen khaata zaleel auqaat aibajoo
jo aala darje ka chugalakhor maal ka bahut bakheel
had se badhane vaala gunehagaar tund mijaaz
aur usake alaava badazaat (haramazaada) bhee hai
choonki maal bahut se bete rakhata hai
jab usake saamane hamaaree aayaten padhee jaatee hain to bol uthata hai ki ye to agalon ke afasaane hain
ham anaqareeb isakee naak par daag lagaenge
jis tarah hamane ek baag vaalon ka imtehaan liya tha usee tarah unaka imtehaan liya jab unhone qasamen kha khaakar kaha ki subah hote ham usaka meva zaroor tod daalenge
aur inshaallaah na kaha
to ye log pade so hee rahe the ki tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se (raaton raat) ek bala chakkar laga gayee
to vah (saara baag jalakar) aisa ho gaya jaise bahut kaalee raat
phir ye log noor ke tadake lage baaham gul machaane
ki agar tumako phal todana hai to apane baag mein savere se chalo
garaz vah log chale aur aapas mein chupake chupake kahate jaate the
ki aaj yahaan tumhaare paas koee faqeer na aane pae
to vah log rok thaam ke ehatamaam ke saath phal todane kee thaane hue savere hee ja pahunche
phir jab use (jala hua siyaah) dekha to kahane lage ham log bhatak gae
(ye hamaara baag nahin phir ye sochakar bole) baat ye hai ki ham log bade badanaseeb hain
jo unamen se munasif mijaaz tha kahane laga kyon mainne tumase nahin kaha tha ki tum log (khuda kee) tasabeeh kyon nahin karate
vah bole hamaara paravaradigaar paak hai beshak hameen hee kusooravaar hain
phir lage ek doosare ke munh dar munh malaamat karane
(aakhir) sabane iqaraar kiya ki hae aphasos beshak ham hee khud sarakash the
ummeed hai ki hamaara paravaradigaar hamen isase behatar baag inaayat faramae ham apane paravaradigaar kee taraph roojoo karate hain
(dekho) yoon azaab hota hai aur aakherat ka azaab to isase kaheen badh kar hai agar ye log samajhate hon
beshak parahezagaar log apane paravaradigaar ke yahaan aisho aaraam ke baagon mein honge
to kya ham pharamaabaradaaron ko naafaramaano ke baraabar kar denge
(haragiz nahin) tumhen kya ho gaya hai tum tum kaisa hukm lagaate ho
ya tumhaare paas koee eemaanee kitaab hai jisamen tum padh lete ho
ki jo cheez pasand karoge tum ko vahaan zaroor milegee
ya tumane hamase qasamen le rakhee hain jo roze qayaamat tak chalee jaegee ki jo kuchh tum hukm doge vahee tumhaare lie zaroor haazir hoga
unase poochho to ki unamen isaka kaun zimmedaar hai
ya (is baab mein) unake aur log bhee shareek hain to agar ye log sachche hain to apane shareekon ko saamane laen
jis din pindalee khol dee jae aur (kaafir) log sajade ke lie bulae jaenge to (sajada) na kar sakenge
unakee onkhen jhukee huee hongee roosavaee un par chhaee hogee aur (duniya mein) ye log sajade ke lie bulae jaate aur hatate katate tandaroost the
to mujhe us kalaam ke jhuthalaane vaale se samajh lene do ham unako aahista aahista is tarah pakad lenge ki unako khabar bhee na hogee
aur main unako mohalat diye jaata hoon beshak meree tadabeer mazaboot hai
(ai rasool) kya tum unase (tabaleege risaalat ka) kuchh sila maangate ho ki un par taavaan ka bojh pad raha hai
ya unake is gaib (kee khabar) hai ki ye log likh liya karate hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar ke hukm ke intezaar mein sabr karo aur machhalee (ka nivaala hone) vaale (yoonus) ke aise na ho jao ki jab vah gusse mein bhare hue the aur apane paravaradigaar ko pukaara
agar tumhaare paravaradigaar kee meharabaanee unakee yaavaree na karatee to chatiyal maidaan mein daal die jaate aur unaka bura haal hota
to unake paravaradigaar ne unako baraguzeeda karake nekokaaron se bana diya
aur kuphfaar jab quraan ko sunate hain to maaloom hota hai ki ye log tumhen ghoor ghoor kar (raah raast se) zaroor phisala denge
aur kahate hain ki ye to sidee hain aur ye (quraan) to saare jahaann kee naseehat hai
sach much hone vaalee (qayaamat)
aur sach much hone vaalee kya cheez hai
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki vah sach much hone vaalee kya hai
(vahee) khad khadaane vaalee (jis) ko aad va samood ne jhuthalaaya
garaz samood to chinghaad se halaak kar die gae
rahe aad to vah bahut shadeed tez ondhee se halaak kar die gae
khuda ne use saat raat aur aath din lagaakar un par chalaaya to logon ko is tarah dhahe (murde) pade dekhata ki goya vah khajooron ke khokhale tane hain
too kya inamen se kisee ko bhee bacha khucha dekhata hai
aur phiraun aur jo log usase pahale the aur vah log (qaume loot) jo ulatee huee bastiyon ke rahane vaale the sab gunaah ke kaam karate the
to un logon ne apane paravaradigaar ke rasool kee naafaramaanee kee to khuda ne bhee unakee badee sakhtee se le de kar daalee
jab paanee chadhane laga to hamane tumako kashatee par savaar kiya
taaki ham use tumhaare lie yaadagaar banaen aur use yaad rakhane vaale kaan sunakar yaad rakhen
phir jab soor mein ek (baar) phoonk maar dee jaegee
aur zameen aur pahaad uthaakar ek baaragee (takara kar) reza reza kar die jaenge to us roz qayaamat aa hee jaegee
aur aasamaan phat jaega
to vah us din bahut phus phusa hoga aur farishte unake kinaare par honge
aur tumhaare paravaradigaar ke arsh ko us din aath farishte apane saron par uthae honge
us din tum sab ke sab (khuda ke saamane) pesh kie jaoge aur tumhaaree koee posheeda baat chhupee na rahegee
to jisako (usaka naame aamaal) daahine haath mein diya jaega to vah (logo se) kahega leejie mera naame aamaal padhie
to main to jaanata tha ki mujhe mera hisaab (kitaab) zaroor milega
phir vah dil pasand aish mein hoga
bade aaleeshaan baag mein
jinake phal bahut jhuke hue qareeb honge
jo kaaraguzaariyaan tum guzishata ayyaam mein karake aage bhej chuke ho usake sile mein maze se khao piyo
aur jisaka naame aamaal unake baen haath mein diya jaega to vah kahega ai kaash mujhe mera naame amal na diya jaata
aur mujhe na maalool hota ki mera hisaab kya hai
ai kaash maut ne (hamesha ke lie mera) kaam tamaam kar diya hota
(afasos) mera maal mere kuchh bhee kaam na aaya
(hae) meree saltanat khaak mein mil gayee (phir hukm hoga)
ise giraphtaar karake tauq pahana do
phir ise jahannum mein jhonk do
phir ek zanjeer mein jisakee naap sattar gaz kee hai use khoob jakad do
(kyon ki) ye na to buzurg khuda hee par eemaan laata tha aur na mohataaj ke khilaane par aamaada (logon ko) karata tha
to aaj na usaka koee gamakhvaar hai
aur na peep ke siva (usake lie) kuchh khaana hai
jisako gunehagaaron ke siva koee nahin khaega
to mujhe un cheezon kee qasam hai
jo tumhen dikhaee detee hain
aur jo tumhen nahin sujhaee detee ki beshak ye (quraan)
ek moaziz pharishte ka laaya hua paigaam hai
aur ye kisee shaayar kee tuk bandee nahin tum log to bahut kam eemaan laate ho
aur na kisee kaahin kee (khyaalee) baat hai tum log to bahut kam gaur karate ho
saare jahaann ke paravaradigaar ka naazil kiya hua (qalaam) hai
agar rasool hamaaree nisbat koee jhooth baat bana laate
to ham unaka daahina haath pakad lete
phir ham zaroor unakee gardan uda dete
to tumamen se koee unase (mujhe rok na sakata)
ye to parahezagaaron ke lie naseehat hai
aur ham khoob jaanate hain ki tum mein se kuchh log (isake) jhuthalaane vaale hain
aur isamen shaq nahin ki ye kaafiron kee hasarat ka baes hai
aur isamen shaq nahin ki ye yaqeenan barahaq hai
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee tasabeeh karo
ek maangane vaale ne kaaphiron ke lie hokar rahane vaale azaab ko maanga
jisako koee taal nahin sakata
jo darje vaale khuda kee taraph se (hone vaala) tha
jisakee taraph farishte aur roohul ameen chadhate hain (aur ye) ek din mein itanee musaafat tay karate hain jisaka andaaza pachaas hazaar baras ka hoga
to tum achchhee tarah in taqaleephon ko baradaasht karate raho
vah (qayaamat) unakee nigaah mein bahut door hai
aur hamaaree nazar mein nazadeek hai
jis din aasamaan pighale hue taanbe ka sa ho jaega
aur pahaad dhunake hue oon ka sa
baavajood ki ek doosare ko dekhate honge
koee kisee dost ko na poochhega gunehagaar to aarazoo karega ki kaash us din ke azaab ke badale usake beton
aur usakee beevee aur usake bhaee
aur usake kunabe ko jisamen vah rahata tha
aur jitane aadamee zameen par hain sab ko le le aur usako chhutakaara de den
(magar) ye haragiz na hoga
jahannum kee vah bhadakatee aag hai ki khaal udhed kar rakh degee
(aur) un logon ko apanee taraph bulaatee hogee
jinhonne (deen se) peeth pheree aur munh moda aur (maal jama kiya)
aur band kar rakha beshak insaan bada laalachee paida hua hai
jab use taqaleeph chhoo bhee gayee to ghabara gaya
aur jab use zara pharaagee haasil huee to bakheel ban baitha
magar jo log namaaz padhate hain
jo apanee namaaz ka iltazaam rakhate hain
aur jinake maal mein maangane vaale aur na maangane vaale ke
lie ek muqarrar hissa hai
aur jo log roze jaza kee tasdeeq karate hain
aur jo log apane paravaradigaar ke azaab se darate rahate hain
beshak unako paravaradigaar ke azaab se bekhauph na hona chaahie
aur jo log apanee sharmagaahon ko apanee beeviyon aur apanee laundiyon ke siva se hiphaazat karate hain
to in logon kee haragiz malaamat na kee jaegee
to jo log unake siva aur ke khaastagaar hon to yahee log had se badh jaane vaale hain
aur jo log apanee amaanaton aur ahadon ka lehaaz rakhate hain
aur jo log apanee yahaadaton par qaayam rahate hain
aur jo log apanee namaazo ka khyaal rakhate hain
yahee log behisht ke baagon mein ijzat se rahenge
to (ai rasool) kaaphiron ko kya ho gaya hai
ki tumhaare paas giroh giroh daahine se baen se daude chale aa rahe hain
kya inamen se har shakhsh is ka mutaminee hai ki chain ke baag (behisht) mein daakhil hoga
haragiz nahin hamane unako jis (gandee) cheez se paida kiya ye log jaanate hain
to main masharikon aur magaribon ke paravaradigaar kee qasam khaata hoon ki ham zaroor is baat kee kudarat rakhate hain
ki unake badale unase behatar log la (basaen) aur ham aajiz nahin hain
to tum unako chhod do ki baatil mein pade khelate rahen yahaan tak ki jis din ka unase vaayada kiya jaata hai unake saamane aa maujood ho
usee din ye log kabron se nikal kar is tarah daudenge goya vah kisee jhande kee taraph daude chale jaate hain
(nidaamat se) unakee onkhen jhukee hongee un par roosavaee chhaee huee hogee ye vahee din hai jisaka unase vaayada kiya jaata tha
hamane nooh ko usakee qaum ke paas (paigambar banaakar) bheja ki qabl usake ki unakee qaum par dardanaak azaab aae unako usase darao
to nooh (apanee qaum se) kahane lage ai meree qaum main to tumhen saaf saaf daraata (aur samajhaata) hoon
ki tum log khuda kee ibaadat karo aur usee se daro aur meree itaat karo

khuda tumhaare gunaah bakhsh dega aur tumhen (maut ke) muqarrar vakt tak baaqee rakhega, beshak jab khuda ka muqarrar kiya hua vakt aa jaata hai to peechhe hataaya nahin ja sakata agar tum samajhate hote
(jab logon ne na maana to) arz kee paravaradigaar main apanee qaum ko (eemaan kee taraph) bulaata raha
lekin vah mere bulaane se aur jyaada gurez hee karate rahe

aur maine jab unako bulaaya ki (ye tauba karen aur) too unhen maaph kar de to unhone apane kaanon mein ungaliyaan de leen aur mujhase chhipane ko kapade odh lie aur ad gae aur bahut shiddat se akad baithe
phir mainne unako bil elaan bulaaya phir unako zaahir ba zaahir samajhaaya
aur unakee posheeda bhee fahamaeesh kee ki mainne unase kaha
apane paravaradigaar se magapherat kee dua maango beshak vah bada bakhshane vaala hai
(aur) tum par aasamaan se moosalaadhaar paanee barasaega
aur maal aur aulaad mein tarakqee dega, aur tumhaare lie baag banaega, aur tumhaare lie naharen jaaree karega
tumhen kya ho gaya hai ki tum khuda kee azamat ka zara bhee khyaal nahin karate
haaloki usee ne tumako tarah tarah ka paida kiya
kya tumane gaur nahin kiya ki khuda ne saat aasamaan oopar talen kyon kar banae
aur usee ne usamen chaand ko noor banaaya aur sooraj ko raushan chiraag bana diya
aur khuda hee tumako zameen se paida kiya
phir tumako usee mein dobaara le jaega aur (qayaamat mein usee se) nikaal kar khada karega
aur khuda hee ne zameen ko tumhaare lie farsh banaaya
taaki tum usake bade bade kushaada raaston mein chalo phiro
(phir) nooh ne arz kee paravaradigaar in logon ne meree naafaramaanee kee us shakhsh ke taabedaar ban ke jisane unake maal aur aulaad mein nuqasaan ke siva faayada na pahunchaaya
aur unhonne (mere saath) badee makkaariyaan kee
aur (ulate) kahane lage ki aapane maaboodon ko haragiz na chhodana aur na vad ko aur sua ko aur na yagoos aur yaooq va nasr ko chhodana
aur unhonne bahuteron ko gumaraah kar chhoda aur too (un) zaalimon kee gumaraahee ko aur badha de
(aakhir) vah apane gunaahon kee badaulat (pahale to) dubae gae phir jahannum mein jhonke gae to un logon ne khuda ke siva kisee ko apana madadagaar na paaya
aur nooh ne arz kee paravaradigaar (in) kaafiron mein rooe zameen par kisee ko basa hua na rahane de
kyonki agar too unako chhod dega to ye (phir) tere bandon ko gumaraah karenge aur unakee aulaad bhee gunaahagaar aur kattee kaaphir hee hogee
paravaradigaar mujhako aur mere maan baap ko aur jo momin mere ghar mein aae unako aur tamaam eemaanadaar mardon aur momin auraton ko bakhsh de aur (in) zaalimon kee bas tabaahee ko aur jyaada kar
(ai rasool logon se) kah do ki mere paas vahee aayee hai ki jinon kee ek jamaat ne (quraan ko) jee lagaakar suna to kahane lage ki hamane ek ajeeb quraan suna hai
jo bhalaee kee raah dikhaata hai to ham us par eemaan le aae aur ab to ham kisee ko apane paravaradigaar ka shareek na banaenge
aur ye ki hamaare paravaradigaar kee shaan bahut badee hai usane na (kisee ko) beevee banaaya aur na beta betee
aur ye ki hamamen se baaz bevakooph khuda ke baare mein had se jyaada lago baaten nikaala karate the
aur ye ki hamaara to khyaal tha ki aadamee aur jin khuda kee nisbat jhoothee baat nahin bol sakate
aur ye ki aadamiyon mein se kuchh log jinnaat mein se baaz logon kee panaah pakada karate the to (isase) unakee sarakashee aur badh gayee
aur ye ki jaisa tumhaara khyaal hai vaisa unaka bhee etaqaad tha ki khuda haragiz kisee ko dobaara nahin zinda karega
aur ye ki hamane aasamaan ko tatola to usako bhee bahut qavee nigehabaanon aur sholo se bhara hua paaya
aur ye ki pahale ham vahaan bahut se maqaamaat mein (baaten) sunane ke lie baitha karate the magar ab koee sunana chaahe to apane lie shole taiyaar paega
aur ye ki ham nahin samajhate ki usase ahale zameen ke haq mein buraee maqasood hai ya unake paravaradigaar ne unakee bhalaee ka iraada kiya hai
aur ye ki hamamen se kuchh log to nekokaar hain aur kuchh log aur tarah ke ham logon ke bhee to kaee tarah ke phiraken hain
aur ye ki ham samajhate the ki ham zameen mein (rah kar) khuda ko haragiz hara nahin sakate hain aur na bhaag kar usako aajiz kar sakate hain
aur ye ki jab hamane hidaayat (kee kitaab) sunee to un par eemaan lae to jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar par eemaan laega to usako na nuqasaan ka khauf hai aur na zulm ka
aur ye ki ham mein se kuchh log to faramaabaradaar hain aur kuchh log naafaramaan to jo log faramaabaradaar hain to vah seedhe raaste par chalen aur rahen
naapharamaan to vah jahannum ke kunde bane
aur (ai rasool tum kah do) ki agar ye log seedhee raah par qaayam rahate to ham zaroor unako alagaaron paanee se seraab karate
taaki usase unakee aazamaeesh karen aur jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar kee yaad se munh modega to vah usako sakht azaab mein jhonk dega
aur ye ki masjiden khaas khuda kee hain to logon khuda ke saath kisee kee ibaadan na karana
aur ye ki jab usaka banda (mohammad) usakee ibaadat ko khada hota hai to log usake gird hujoom karake gir padate hain
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main to apane paravaradigaar kee ibaadat karata hoon aur usaka kisee ko shareek nahin banaata
(ye bhee) kah do ki main tumhaare haq mein na buraee hee ka ekhteyaar rakhata hoon aur na bhalaee ka
(ye bhee) kah do ki mujhe khuda (ke azaab) se koee bhee panaah nahin de sakata aur na main usake siva kaheen panaah kee jagah dekhata hoon

khuda kee taraph se (ehakaam ke) pahuncha dene aur usake paigaamon ke siva (kuchh nahin kar sakata) aur jisane khuda aur usake rasool kee naapharamaanee kee to usake lie yaqeenan jahannum kee aag hai jisamen vah hamesha aur abaadul aabaad tak rahega
yahaan tak ki jab ye log un cheezon ko dekh lenge jinaka unase vaayada kiya jaata hai to unako maaloom ho jaega ki kisake madadagaar kamazor aur kisaka shumaar kam hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main nahin jaanata ki jis din ka tumase vaayada kiya jaata hai qareeb hai ya mere paravaradigaar ne usakee muddat daraaz kar dee hai
(vahee) gaibavo hai aur apanee gaib kee baate kisee par zaahir nahin karata
magar jis paigambar ko pasand pharamae to usake aage aur peechhe nigehabaan pharishte muqarrar kar deta hai
taaki dekh le ki unhonne apane paravaradigaar ke paigaamaat pahuncha die aur (yoon to) jo kuchh unake paas hai vah sab par haavee hai aur usane to ek ek cheez gin rakhee hain
ai (mere) chaadar lapete rasool
raat ko (namaaz ke vaaste) khade raho magar (pooree raat nahin)
thodee raat ya aadhee raat ya isase bhee kuchh kam kar do ya usase kuchh badha do
aur quraan ko baaqaayada thahar thahar kar padha karo
ham anaqareeb tum par ek bhaaree hukm naazil karenge isamen shaq nahin ki raat ko uthana
khoob (naphs ka) paamaal karana aur bahut thikaane se zikr ka vakt hai
din ko to tumhaare bahut bade bade ashagaal hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar ke naam ka zikr karo aur sabase toot kar usee ke ho raho
(vahee) masharik aur magarib ka maalik hai usake siva koee maabood nahin to tum usee ko kaarasaaz banao
aur jo kuchh log baka karate hain us par sabr karo aur unase ba unavaane shaesta alag thalag raho
aur mujhe un jhuthalaane vaalon se jo daulatamand hain samajh lene do aur unako thodee see mohalat de do
beshak hamaare paas bediyaan (bhee) hain aur jalaane vaalee aag (bhee)
aur gale mein phansane vaala khaana (bhee) aur dukh dene vaala azaab (bhee)
jis din zameen aur pahaad larazane lagenge aur pahaad ret ke teele se bhur bhure ho jaenge
(ai makka vaalon) hamane tumhaare paas (usee tarah) ek rasool (mohammad) ko bheja jo tumhaare maamale mein gavaahee de jis tarah phiraun ke paas ek rasool (moosa) ko bheja tha
to phiraun ne us rasool kee naafaramaanee kee to hamane bhee (usakee saza mein) usako bahut sakht pakada
to agar tum bhee na maanoge to us din (ke azaab) se kyon kar bachoge jo bachchon ko boodha bana dega
jis din aasamaan phat padega (ye) usaka vaayada poora hokar rahega
beshak ye naseehat hai to jo shakhsh chaahe apane paravaradigaar kee raah ekhteyaar kare

(ai rasool) tumhaara paravaradigaar chaahata hai ki tum aur tumhaare chand saath ke log (kabhee) do tihaee raat ke kareeb aur (kabhee) aadhee raat aur (kabhee) tihaee raat (namaaz mein) khade rahate ho aur khuda hee raat aur din ka achchhee tarah andaaza kar sakata hai use maaloom hai ki tum log us par pooree tarah se haavee nahin ho sakate to usane tum par meharabaanee kee to jitana aasaanee se ho sake utana (namaaz mein) quraan padh liya karo aur vah jaanata hai ki anaqareeb tumamen se baaz beemaar ho jaenge aur baaz khuda ke fazal kee talaash mein rooe zameen par saphar ekhteyaar karenge aur kuchh log khuda kee raah mein jehaad karenge to jitana tum aasaanee se ho sake padh liya karo aur namaaz paabandee se padho aur zakaat dete raho aur khuda ko karze hasana do aur jo nek amal apane vaaste (khuda ke saamane) pesh karoge usako khuda ke haan behatar aur sile mein burzug tar paoge aur khuda se magapherat kee dua maango beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
ai (mere) kapada odhane vaale (rasool) utho
aur logon ko (azaab se) darao
aur apane paravaradigaar kee badaee karo
aur apane kapade paak rakho
aur gandagee se alag raho
aur isee tarah ehasaan na karo ki jyaada ke khaastagaar bano
aur apane paravaradigaar ke lie sabr karo
phir jab soor phoonka jaega
to vah din kaafiron par sakht din hoga
aasaan nahin hoga
(ai rasool) mujhe aur us shakhsh ko chhod do jise maine akela paida kiya
aur use bahut sa maal diya
aur nazar ke saamane rahane vaale bete (die)
aur use har tarah ke saamaan se vusat dee
phir us par bhee vah tama rakhata hai ki main aur badhaoon
ye haragiz na hoga ye to meree aayaton ka dushman tha
to main anaqareeb us sakht azaab mein mubtila karoonga
usane phikr kee aur ye tajaveez kee
to ye (kambakht) maar daala jae
usane kyon kar tajaveez kee
phir gaur kiya
phir tyoree chadhaee aur munh bana liya
phir peeth pher kar chala gaya aur akad baitha
phir kahane laga ye bas jaadoo hai jo (agalon se) chala aata hai
ye to bas aadamee ka kalaam hai
(khuda ka nahin) main use anaqareeb jahannum mein jhonk doonga
aur tum kya jaanon ki jahannum kya hai
vah na baaqee rakhegee na chhod degee
aur badan ko jala kar siyaah kar degee
us par unnees (farishte muayyan) hain

aur hamane jahannum ka nigehabaan to bas pharishton ko banaaya hai aur unaka ye shumaar bhee kaaphiron kee aazamaish ke lie muqarrar kiya taaki ahale kitaab (phauran) yaqeen kar len aur momino ka eemaan aur jyaada ho aur ahale kitaab aur momineen (kisee tarah) shaq na karen aur jin logon ke dil mein (nifaak ka) marz hai (vah) aur kaaphir log kah baithe ki is masal (ke bayaan karane) se khuda ka kya matalab hai yoon khuda jise chaahata hai gumaraahee mein chhod deta hai aur jise chaahata hai hidaayat karata hai aur tumhaare paravaradigaar ke lashakaron ko usake siva koee nahin jaanata aur ye to aadamiyon ke lie bas naseehat hai
sun rakho (hamen) chaand kee qasam
aur raat kee jab jaane lage
aur subah kee jab raushan ho jae
ki vah (jahannum) bhee ek bahut badee (aafat) hai
(aur) logon ke daraane vaalee hai
(sabake lie naheeen balki) tumamen se vah jo shakhsh (nekee kee taraf) aage badhana
aur (buraee se) peechhe hatana chaahe har shakhsh apane aamaal ke badale gird hai
magar daahine haath (mein naame amal lene) vaale
(behisht ke) baagon mein gunehagaaron se baaham poochh rahe honge
ki aakhir tumhen dozakh mein kaun see cheez (ghaseet) laayee
vah log kahenge
ki ham na to namaaz padha karate the
aur na mohataajon ko khaana khilaate the
aur ahale baatil ke saath ham bhee bade kaam mein ghus padate the
aur roz jaza ko jhuthalaaya karate the (aur yoon hee rahe)
yahaan tak ki hamen maut aa gayee
to (us vakt) unhen sifaarish karane vaalon kee sifaarish kuchh kaam na aaegee
aur unhen kya ho gaya hai ki naseehat se munh mode hue hain
goya vah vahashee gadhe hain
ki yer se (dum daba kar) bhaagate hain
asal ye hai ki unamen se har shakhsh isaka mutaminee hai ki use khulee huee (aasamaanee) kitaaben ata kee jaen
ye to haragiz na hoga balki ye to aakherat hee se nahin darate
haan haan beshak ye (quraan sara sar) naseehat hai
to jo chaahe use yaad rakhe
aur khuda kee masheeyat ke bagair ye log yaad rakhane vaale nahin vahee (bandon ke) daraane ke qaabil aur bakhyish ka maalik hai
main roje qayaamat kee qasam khaata hoon
(aur buraee se) malaamat karane vaale jee kee qasam khaata hoon (ki tum sab dobaara) zaroor zinda kie jaoge
kya insaan ye khyaal karata hai (ki ham usakee haddiyon ko boseeda hone ke baad) jama na karenge haan (zaroor karengen)
ham is par qaadir hain ki ham usakee por por duroost karen
magar insaan to ye jaanata hai ki apane aage bhee (hamesha) buraee karata jae
poochhata hai ki qayaamat ka din kab hoga
to jab onkhe chakaachaundh mein aa jaengee
aur chaand gahan mein lag jaega
aur sooraj aur chaand ikattha kar die jaenge
to insaan kahega aaj kahaan bhaag kar jaoon
yaqeen jaanon kaheen panaah nahin
us roz tumhaare paravaradigaar hee ke paas thikaana hai
us din aadamee ko jo kuchh usake aage peechhe kiya hai bata diya jaega
balki insaan to apane oopar aap gavaah hai
agarache vah apane gunaahon kee ujr va zaroor maazerat padha karata rahe
(ai rasool) vahee ke jaldee yaad karane vaaste apanee zabaan ko harakat na do
usaka jama kar dena aur padhava dena to yaqeenee hamaare zimme hai
to jab ham usako (jibareel kee zabaanee) padhen to tum bhee (poora) sunane ke baad isee tarah padha karo
phir us (ke mushkilaat ka samajha dena bhee hamaare zimmen hai)
magar (logon) haq to ye hai ki tum log duniya ko dost rakhate ho
aur aakherat ko chhode baithe ho
us roz bahut se chehare to taro taaza bashabaab honge
(aur) apane paravaradigaar (kee neamat) ko dekh rahe honge
aur bahutere munh us din udaas honge
samajh rahen hain ki un par museebat padane vaalee hai ki kamar tod degee
sun lo jab jaan (badan se khinch ke) hansalee tak aa pahunchegee
aur kaha jaega ki (is vakt) qoee jhaad phoonk karane vaala hai
aur marane vaale ne samajha ki ab (sabase) judaee hai
aur (maut kee takaleef se) pindalee se pindalee lipat jaegee
us din tumako apane paravaradigaar kee baaragaah mein chalana hai
to usane (gaphalat mein) na (kalaame khuda kee) tasadeeq kee na namaaz padhee
magar jhuthalaaya aur (eemaan se) munh phera
apane ghar kee taraph itaraata hua chala
aphasos hai tujh par phir aphasos hai phir tuf hai
tujh par phir tuf hai
kya insaan ye samajhata hai ki vah yoon hee chhod diya jaega
kya vah (ibtedan) manee ka ek qatara na tha jo raham mein daalee jaatee hai
phir lothada hua phir khuda ne use banaaya
phir use duroost kiya phir usakee do kismen banaayeen (ek) mard aur (ek) aurat
kya is par qaadir nahin ki (qayaamat mein) murdon ko zinda kar de
beshak insaan par ek aisa vakt aa chuka hai ki vah koee cheez qaabile zikr na tha
hamane insaan ko makhaloot nutphe se paida kiya ki use aazamaaye to hamane use sunata dekhata banaaya
aur usako raasta bhee dikha diya (ab vah) khvaah shukr guzaar ho khvaah naashukra
hamane kaafiron ke zanjeere, tauk aur dahakatee huee aag taiyaar kar rakhee hai
beshak nekokaar log sharaab ke vah saagar piyenge jisamen kaaphoor kee aamezish hogee ye ek chashma hai jisamen se khuda ke (khaas) bande piyenge
aur jahaan chaahenge baha le jaenge
ye vah log hain jo nazaren pooree karate hain aur us din se jinakee sakhtee har tarah phailee hogee darate hain
aur usakee mohabbat mein mohataaj aur yateem aur aseer ko khaana khilaate hain
(aur kahate hain ki) ham to tumako bas khaalis khuda ke lie khilaate hain ham na tum se badale ke khaastagaar hain aur na shukr guzaaree ke
hamako to apane paravaradigaar se us din ka dar hai jisamen munh ban jaenge (aur) chehare par havaiyaan udatee hongee
to khuda unhen us din kee takaleef se bacha lega aur unako taazagee aur khushadilee ata pharamaega
aur unake sabr ke badale (behisht ke) baag aur resham (kee poshaak) ata faramaega
vahaan vah takhton par takie lagae (baithe) honge na vahaan (aaphataab kee) dhoop dekhenge aur na shiddat kee sardee
aur ghane darakhton ke sae un par jhuke hue honge aur mevon ke guchchhe unake bahut qareeb har tarah unake ekhteyaar mein
aur unake saamane chaandee ke saagar aur sheeshe ke nihaayat shaphfaaf gilaas ka daur chal raha hoga
aur sheeshe bhee (kaanch ke nahin) chaandee ke jo theek andaaze ke mutaabik banae gae hain
aur vahaan unhen aisee sharaab pilaee jaegee jisamen janajabeel (ke paanee) kee aamezish hogee
ye behasht mein ek chashma hai jisaka naam salasabeel hai
aur unake saamane hamesha ek haalat par rahane vaale naujavaal ladake chakkar lagaate honge ki jab tum unako dekho to samajho ki bikhare hue motee hain
aur jab tum vahaan nigaah uthaoge to har tarah kee neamat aur azeemush shaan saltanat dekhoge
unake oopar sabz kreb aur atalas kee poshaak hogee aur unhen chaandee ke kangan pahanae jaenge aur unaka paravaradigaar unhen nihaayat paakeeza sharaab pilaega
ye yaqeenee tumhaare lie hoga aur tumhaaree (kaaraguzaariyon ke) sile mein aur tumhaaree koshish qaabile shukr guzaaree hai
(ai rasool) hamane tum par quraan ko raphta raphta karake naazil kiya
to tum apane paravaradigaar ke hukm ke intazaar mein sabr kie raho aur un logon mein se gunaahagaar aur naashukre kee pairavee na karana
subah shaam apane paravaradigaar ka naam lete raho
aur kuchh raat gae usaka sajada karo aur badee raat tak usakee tasbeeh karate raho
ye log yaqeenan duniya ko pasand karate hain aur bade bhaaree din ko apane pase pusht chhod baithe hain
hamane unako paida kiya aur unake aaza ko mazaboot banaaya aur agar ham chaahen to unake badale unheen ke jaise log le aaen
beshak ye kuraan saraasar naseehat hai to jo shakhsh chaahe apane paravaradigaar kee raah le
aur jab tak khuda ko manzoor na ho tum log kuchh bhee chaah nahin sakate beshak khuda bada vaaqiphakaar daana hai
jisako chaahe apanee rahamat mein daakhil kar le aur zaalimon ke vaaste usane dardanaak azaab taiyaar kar rakha hai
havaon kee qasam jo (pahale) dheemee chalatee hain
phir zor pakad ke ondhee ho jaatee hain
aur (baadalon ko) ubhaar kar phaila detee hain
phir (unako) phaad kar juda kar detee hain
phir pharishton kee qasam jo vahee laate hain
taaki hujjat tamaam ho aur dara diya jae
ki jis baat ka tumase vaayada kiya jaata hai vah zaroor hokar rahega
phir jab taaron kee chamak jaatee rahegee
aur jab aasamaan phat jaega
aur jab pahaad (rooee kee tarah) ude ude phirenge
aur jab paigambar log ek muayyan vakt par jama kie jaenge
(phir) bhala in (baaton) mein kis din ke lie taakheer kee gayee hai
faisale ke din ke lie
aur tumako kya maaloom kee faisale ka din kya hai
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee mittee kharaab hai
kya hamane agalon ko halaak nahin kiya
phir unake peechhe peechhe pichhalon ko bhee chalata karenge
ham gunehagaaron ke saath aisa hee kiya karate hain
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee mittee kharaab hai
kya hamane tumako zaleel paanee (manee) se paida nahin kiya
phir hamane usako ek muayyan vakt tak
ek mahaphooz maqaam (raham) mein rakha
phir (usaka) ek andaaza muqarrar kiya to ham kaisa achchha andaaza muqarrar karane vaale hain
un din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
kya hamane zameen ko zindon aur murdon ko sametane vaalee nahin banaaya
aur usamen oonche oonche atal pahaad rakh die
aur tum logon ko meetha paanee pilaaya
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
jis cheez ko tum jhuthalaaya karate the ab usakee taraf chalo
(dhuen ke) saaye kee taraf chalo jisake teen hisse hain
jisamen na thandak hai aur na jahannum kee lapak se bachaega
usase itane bade bade angaare barasate honge jaise mahal
goya zard rang ke oont hain
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
ye vah din hoga ki log lab tak na hila sakenge
aur unako ijaazat dee jaegee ki kuchh ujr maazerat kar saken
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee tabaahee hai
yahee phaisale ka din hai (jis mein) hamane tumako aur agalon ko ikattha kiya hai
to agar tumhen koee daanv karana ho to aao chal chuko
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
beshak parahezagaar log (darakhton kee) ghanee chhaanv mein honge
aur chashmon aur aadamiyon mein jo unhen maragoob ho
(duniya mein) jo amal karate the usake badale mein maze se khao piyo
mubaarak ham nekokaaron ko aisa hee badala diya karate hain
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
(jhuthalaane vaalon) chand din chain se kha pee lo tum beshak gunehagaar ho
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee mittee kharaab hai
aur jab unase kaha jaata hai ki rookoou karon to rookoou nahin karate
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
ab isake baad ye kis baat par eemaan laenge
ye log aapas mein kis cheez ka haal poochhate hain
ek badee khabar ka haal
jisamen log ekhtelaaph kar rahe hain
dekho unhen anaqareeb hee maaloom ho jaega
phir inhen anaqareeb hee zaroor maaloom ho jaega
kya hamane zameen ko bichhauna
aur pahaadon ko (zameen) kee mekhe nahin banaaya
aur hamane tum logon ko joda joda paida kiya
aur tumhaaree neend ko aaraam (ka bais) qaraar diya
aur raat ko parada banaaya
aur ham hee ne din ko (kasab) maaash (ka vakt) banaaya
aur tumhaare oopar saat mazaboot (aasamaan) banae
aur ham hee ne (sooraj) ko raushan chiraag banaaya
aur ham hee ne baadalon se moosalaadhaar paanee barasaaya
taaki usake zarie se daane aur sabazee
aur ghane ghane baag paida karen
beshak phaisale ka din muqarrar hai
jis din soor phoonka jaega aur tum log giroh giroh haazir hoge
aur aasamaan khol die jaenge
to (usamen) daravaaze ho jaenge aur pahaad (apanee jagah se) chalae jaenge to ret hokar rah jaenge
beshak jahannum ghaat mein hai
sarakashon ka (vahee) thikaana hai
usamen muddaton pade jheenkate rahengen
na vahaan thandak ka maza chakhenge aur na khaulate hue paanee
aur bahatee huee peep ke siva kuchh peene ko milega
(ye unakee kaarastaaniyon ka) poora poora badala hai
beshak ye log aakherat ke hisaab kee ummeed hee na rakhate the
aur in logo hamaaree aayaton ko buree tarah jhuthalaaya
aur hamane har cheez ko likh kar manazabat kar rakha hai
to ab tum maza chakho hamato tum par azaab hee badhaate jaenge
beshak parahezagaaron ke lie badee kaamayaabee hai
(yaani behasht ke) baag aur angoor
aur vah auraten jinakee uthatee huee javaaniyaan
aur baaham hamajoliyaan hain aur sharaab ke labarez saagar
aur sharaab ke labarez saagar vahaan na behooda baat sunenge aur na jhooth
(ye) tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se kaafee inaam aur sila hai
jo saare aasamaan aur zameen aur jo in donon ke beech mein hai sabaka maalik hai bada meharabaan logon ko usase baat ka poora na hoga
jis din jibareel aur pharishte (usake saamane) par baandh kar khade honge (us din) usase koee baat na kar sakega magar jise khuda ijaazat de aur vah thikaane kee baat kahe
vah din barahaq hai to jo shakhsh chaahe apane paravaradigaar kee baaragaah mein (apana) thikaana banae
hamane tum logon ko anaqareeb aane vaale azaab se dara diya jis din aadamee apane haathon pahale se bheje hue (aamaal) ko dekhega aur kaafir kahega kaash main khaak ho jaata
un (farishton) kee qasam
jo (kuphfaar kee rooh) doob kar sakhtee se kheench lete hain
aur unakee qasam jo (momineen kee jaan) aasaanee se khol dete hain
aur unakee qasam jo (aasamaan zameen ke daramiyaan) pairate phirate hain
phir ek ke aage badhate hain
phir (duniya ke) intazaam karate hain (unakee qasam) ki qayaamat ho kar rahegee
jis din zameen ko bhoochaal aaega phir usake peechhe aur zalazala aaega
us din dilon ko dhadakan hogee
unakee onkhen (nidaamat se) jhukee huee hongee
kuphfaar kahate hain ki kya ham ulate paanv (zindagee kee taraf) phir lautenge
kya jab ham khokhal haddiyaan ho jaenge
kahate hain ki ye lautana to bada nuqasaan deh hai
vah (qayaamat) to (goya) bas ek sakht cheekh hogee
aur log shaq baaragee ek maidaan (hashr) mein maujood honge
(ai rasool) kya tumhaare paas moosa ka kissa bhee pahuncha hai
jab unako paravaradigaar ne toova ke maidaan mein pukaara
ki phiraun ke paas jao vah sarakash ho gaya hai
(aur usase) kaho ki kya teree khvaahish hai ki (kuphr se) paak ho jae
aur main tujhe tere paravaradigaar kee raah bata doon to tujhako khauph (paida) ho
garaz moosa ne use (asa ka bada) maujiza dikhaaya
to usane jhuthala diya aur na maana
phir peeth pher kar (khilaaf kee) tadabeer karane laga
phir (logon ko) jama kiya aur buland aavaaz se chillaaya
to kahane laga main tum logon ka sabase bada paravaradigaar hoon
to khuda ne use duniya aur aakherat (donon) ke azaab mein giraphtaar kiya
beshak jo shakhsh (khuda se) dare usake lie is (kisse) mein ibarat hai
bhala tumhaara paida karana jyaada mushkil hai ya aasamaan ka
ki usee ne usako banaaya usakee chhat ko khoob ooncha rakha
phir use duroost kiya aur usakee raat ko taareek banaaya aur (din ko) usakee dhoop nikaalee
aur usake baad zameen ko phailaaya
usee mein se usaka paanee aur usaka chaara nikaala
aur pahaadon ko usamen gaad diya
(ye sab saamaan) tumhaare aur tumhaare chaarapaayo ke faayade ke lie hai
to jab badee sakht museebat (qayaamat) aa maujood hogee
jis din insaan apane kaamon ko kuchh yaad karega
aur jahannum dekhane vaalon ke saamane zaahir kar dee jaegee
to jisane (duniya mein) sar uthaaya tha
aur duniyaavee zindagee ko tarajeeh dee thee
usaka thikaana to yaqeenan dozakh hai
magar jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar ke saamane khade hone se darata aur jee ko naajaayaz khvaahishon se rokata raha
to usaka thikaana yaqeenan behasht hai
(ai rasool) log tum se qayaamat ke baare mein poochhate hain
ki usaka kaheen thal beda bhee hai
to tum usake zikr se kis fikr mein ho
us (ke ilm) kee inteha tumhaare paravaradigaar hee tak hai to tum bas jo usase dare usako daraane vaale ho
jis din vah log isako dekhenge to (samajhenge ki duniya mein) bas ek shaam ya subah thahare the
vah apanee baat par cheen ba jabeen ho gaya
aur munh pher baitha ki usake paas naabeena aa gaya
aur tumako kya maaloom yaayad vah (taaleem se) paakeezagee haasil karata
ya vah naseehat sunata to naseehat usake kaam aatee
to jo kuchh paravaah nahin karata
usake to tum darapai ho jaate ho haaloki agar vah na sudhare
to tum zimmedaar nahin
aur jo tumhaare paas lapakata hua aata hai
aur (khuda se) darata hai
to tum usase berookhee karate ho
dekho ye (quraan) to saraasar naseehat hai
to jo chaahe ise yaad rakhe
(lauhe mahaphooz ke) bahut moazazij auraaq mein (likha hua) hai
buland marataba aur paak hain
(aise) likhane vaalon ke haathon mein hai
jo buzurg nekokaar hain
insaan halaak ho jae vah kya kaisa naashukra hai
(khuda ne) use kis cheez se paida kiya
nutphe se use paida kiya phir usaka andaaza muqarrar kiya
phir usaka raasta aasaan kar diya
phir use maut dee phir use kabr mein dafan karaaya
phir jab chaahega utha khada karega
sach to yah hai ki khuda ne jo hukm use diya usane usako poora na kiya
to insaan ko apane ghaate hee taraph gaur karana chaahie
ki ham hee ne (baadal) se paanee barasaaya
phir ham hee ne zameen (darakht ugaakar) cheeree phaadee
phir hamane usamen anaaj ugaaya
aur angoor aur tarakaariyaan
aur zaitoon aur khajooren
aur ghane ghane baag aur meve
aur chaara (ye sab kuchh) tumhaare aur tumhaare
chaarapaayon ke phaayade ke lie (banaaya)
to jab kaanon ke parade phaadane vaalee (qayaamat) aa maujood hogee
us din aadamee apane bhaee
aur apanee maan aur apane baap
aur apane ladake baalon se bhaagega
us din har shakhsh (apanee najaat kee) aisee fikr mein hoga jo usake (mashagool hone ke) lie kaafee hon
bahut se chehare to us din chamakate honge
khandaan shaandaan (yahee neko kaar hain)
aur bahut se chehare aise honge jin par gard padee hogee
us par siyaahee chhaee huee hogee
yahee kuphfaar badakaar hain
jis vakt aafataab kee chaadar ko lapet liya jaega
aur jis vakt taare gir padegen
aur jab pahaad chalae jaengen
aur jab anaqareeb janane vaalee oontaniyon bekaar kar dee jaengee
aur jis vakt vahashee jaanavar ikattha kiye jaayenge
aur jis vakt dariya aag ho jaayenge
aur jis vakt ruhen haviyon se mila dee jaengee
aur jis vakt zinda dar gor ladakee se poochha jaega
ki vah kis gunaah ke badale maaree gayee
aur jis vakt (aamaal ke) daphtar khole jaen
aur jis vakt aasamaan ka chhilaka utaara jaega
aur jab dozakh (kee aag) bhadakaayee jaegee
aur jab behisht qareeb kar dee jaegee
tab har shakhsh maaloom karega ki vah kya (aamaal) lekar aaya
to mujhe un sitaaron kee qasam jo chalate chalate peechhe hat jaate
aur gaayab hote hain
aur raat kee qasam jab khatm hone ko aae
aur subah kee qasam jab raushan ho jae
ki beshak yen (quraan) ek muaziz pharishta (jibareel kee zabaan ka paigaam hai)
jo bade qavee arsh ke maalik kee baaragaah mein buland rutaba hai
vahaan (sab pharishton ka) saradaar amaanatadaar hai
aur (makke vaalon) tumhaare saathee mohammad deevaane nahin hain
aur beshak unhonen jibareel ko (aasamaan ke) khule (sharaqee) kinaare par dekha hai
aur vah gaib kee baaton ke zaahir karane mein bakheel nahin
aur na yah maradood shaitaan ka qaul hai
phir tum kahaan jaate ho
ye saare jahon ke logon ke lie bas naseehat hai
(magar) usee ke lie jo tumamen seedhee raah chale
aur tum to saare jahon ke paalane vaale khuda ke chaahe bagair kuchh bhee chaah nahin sakate
jab aasamaan tarkh jaega
aur jab taare jhad padenge
aur jab dariya bah (kar ek doosare se mil) jaenge
aur jab kabren ukhaad dee jaengee
tab har shakhsh ko maaloom ho jaega ki usane aage kya bheja tha aur peechhe kya chhoda tha
ai insaan tumhen apane paravaradigaar ke baare mein kis cheez ne dhoka diya
jisane tujhe paida kiya to tujhe duroost banaaya aur munaasib aaza die
aur jis soorat mein usane chaaha tere jod band milae
haan baat ye hai ki tum log jaza (ke din) ko jhuthalaate ho
haaloki tum par nigehabaan muqarrar hain
burzug log (pharishte sab baaton ko) likhane vaale (keraaman qaatebeen)
jo kuchh tum karate ho vah sab jaanate hain
beshak neko kaar (behisht kee) neamaton mein honge
aur badakaar log yaqeenan jahannum mein jaza ke din
usee mein jhonke jaenge
aur vah log usase chhup na sakenge
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki jaza ka din kya hai
phir tumhen kya maaloom ki jaza ka din kya cheez hai
us din koee shakhsh kisee shakhsh kee bhalaee na kar sakega aur us din hukm sirph khuda hee ka hoga
naap taul mein kamee karane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
jo auren se naap kar len to poora poora len
aur jab unakee naap ya taul kar den to kam kar den
kya ye log itana bhee khyaal nahin karate
ki ek bade (sakht) din (qayaamat) mein uthae jaenge
jis din tamaam log saare jahaann ke paravaradigaar ke saamane khade honge
sun rakho ki badakaaron ke naam e amaal sijjeen mein hain
tumako kya maaloom sijjeen kya cheez hai
ek likha hua dafatar hai jisamen shayaateen ke (aamaal darj hain)
us din jhuthalaane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
jo log roje zaza ko jhuthalaate hain
haaloki usako had se nikal jaane vaale gunaahagaar ke siva koee nahin jhuthalaata
jab usake saamane hamaaree aayaten padhee jaatee hain to kahata hai ki ye to agalon ke aphasaane hain
nahin nahin baat ye hai ki ye log jo aamaal (bad) karate hain unaka unake dilon par jang baith gaya hai
beshak ye log us din apane paravaradigaar (kee rahamat se) rok die jaenge
phir ye log zaroor jahannum vaasil honge
phir unase kaha jaega ki ye vahee cheez to hai jise tum jhuthalaaya karate the
ye bhee sun rakho ki neko ke naam e amaal illeeyeen mein honge
aur tumako kya maaloom ki illeeyeen kya hai vah ek likha hua dafatar hai
jisamen nekon ke aamaal darj hain
usake paas muqarrib (farishte) haazir hain
beshak nek log neamaton mein honge
takhton par baithe nazaare karenge
tum unake cheharon hee se raahat kee taazagee maaloom kar loge
unako sar ba mohar khaalis sharaab pilaayee jaegee
jisakee mohar mishk kee hogee aur usakee taraph alabatta shaayaqeen ko ragabat karanee chaahie
aur us (sharaab) mein tasaneem ke paanee kee aamezish hogee
vah ek chashma hai jisamen muqarebeen piyenge
beshak jo gunaahagaar mominon se hansee kiya karate the
aur jab unake paas se guzarate to un par chashamak karate the
aur jab apane ladake vaalon kee taraf laut kar aate the to itaraate hue
aur jab un momineen ko dekhate to kah baithate the ki ye to yaqeenee gumaraah hain
haaloki ye log un par kuchh nigaraan bana ke to bheje nahin gae the
to aaj (qayaamat mein) eemaanadaar log kaafiron se hansee karenge
(aur) takhton par baithe nazaare karenge
ki ab to kaafiron ko unake kie ka poora poora badala mil gaya
jab aasamaan phat jaega
aur apane paravaradigaar ka hukm baja laega aur use vaajib bhee yahee hai
aur jab zameen (baraabar karake) taan dee jaegee
aur jo kuchh usamen hai ugal degee aur bilkul khaalee ho jaegee
aur apane paravaradigaar ka hukm baja laegee
aur us par laazim bhee yahee hai (to qayaamat aa jaegee) ai insaan too apane paravaradigaar kee huzooree kee koshish karata hai
to too (ek na ek din) usake saamane haazir hoga phir (us din) jisaka naamae aamaal usake daahine haath mein diya jaega
usase to hisaab aasaan tareeke se liya jaega
aur (phir) vah apane (momineen ke) qabeele kee taraph khush khush palatega
lekin jis shakhsh ko usaka naame aamal usakee peeth ke peechhe se diya jaega
vah to maut kee dua karega
aur jahannum vaasil hoga
ye shakhsh to apane ladake baalon mein mast rahata tha
aur samajhata tha ki kabhee (khuda kee taraph) phir kar jaega hee nahin
haan usaka paravaradigaar yaqeenee usako dekh bhaal kar raha hai
to mujhe shaam kee murkhee kee qasam
aur raat kee aur un cheezon kee jinhen ye dhaank letee hai
aur chaand kee jab poora ho jae
ki tum log zaroor ek sakhtee ke baad doosaree sakhtee mein phansoge
to un logon ko kya ho gaya hai ki eemaan nahin eemaan nahin laate
aur jab unake saamane quraan padha jaata hai to (khuda ka) sajada nahin karate (21) (sajada)
balki kaafir log to (aur use) jhuthalaate hain
aur jo baaten ye log apane dilon mein chhipaate hain khuda use khoob jaanata hai
to (ai rasool) unhen dardanaak azaab kee khushakhabaree de do
magar jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe achchhe kaam kie unake lie beintiha ajr (va savaab hai)
burzon vaale aasamaanon kee qasam
aur us din kee jisaka vaayada kiya gaya hai
aur gavaah kee aur jisakee gavaahee de jaegee
usakee (ki kuphfaar makka halaak hue) jis tarah khandaq vaale halaak kar die gae
jo khandaqen aag kee theen
jisamen (unhonne musalamaanon ke lie) eendhan jhonk rakha tha
jab vah un (khandaqon) par baithe hue aur jo sulook eemaanadaaron ke saath karate the usako saamane dekh rahe the
aur unako momineen kee yahee baat buree maaloom huee ki vah log khuda par eemaan lae the jo zabaradast aur sazaavaar hamd hai
vah (khuda) jisakee saare aasamaan zameen mein baadashaahat hai aur khuda har cheez se vaaqif hai
beshak jin logon ne eemaanadaar mardon aur auraton ko takaleephen deen phir tauba na kee unake lie jahannum ka azaab to hai hee (isake alaava) jalane ka bhee azaab hoga
beshak jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe kaam karate rahe unake lie vah baagaat hain jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai
beshak tumhaare paravaradigaar kee pakad bahut sakht hai
vahee pahalee dafa paida karata hai aur vahee dobaara (qayaamat mein zinda) karega
aur vahee bada bakhshane vaala mohabbat karane vaala hai
arsh ka maalik bada aaleeshaan hai
jo chaahata hai karata hai
kya tumhaare paas lashakaron kee khabar pahunchee hai
(yaani) phiraun va samood kee (zaroor pahunchee hai)
magar kuphfaar to jhuthalaane hee (kee fikr) mein hain
aur khuda unako peechhe se ghere hue hai (ye jhuthalaane ke qaabil nahin)
balki ye to quraan majeed hai
jo lauhe mahaphooz mein likha hua hai
aasamaan aur raat ko aane vaale kee qasam
aur tumako kya maaloom raat ko aane vaala kya hai
(vah) chamakata hua taara hai
(is baat kee qasam) ki koee shakhsh aisa nahin jis par nigehabaan muqarrar nahin
to insaan ko dekhana chaahie ki vah kis cheez se paida hua hain
vah uchhalate hue paanee (manee) se paida hua hai
jo peeth aur seene kee haddiyon ke beech mein se nikalata hai
beshak khuda usake dobaara (paida) karane par zaroor kudarat rakhata hai
jis din dilon ke bhed jaanche jaenge
to (us din) usaka na kuchh zor chalega aur na koee madadagaar hoga
chakkar (khaane) vaale aasamaan kee qasam
aur phatane vaalee (zameen kee qasam)
beshak ye quraan qaule faisal hai
aur lago nahin hai
beshak ye kuphfaar apanee tadabeer kar rahe hain
aur main apanee tadbeer kar raha hoon
to kaafiron ko mohalat do bas unako thodee see mohalat do
ai rasool apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar ke naam kee tasbeeh karo
jisane (har cheez ko) paida kiya
aur duroost kiya aur jisane (usaka) andaaza muqarrar kiya phir raah bataayee
aur jisane (haivaanaat ke lie) chaara ugaaya
phir khushk use siyaah rang ka kooda kar diya
ham tumhen (aisa) padha denge ki kabhee bhoolo hee nahin
magar jo khuda chaahe (mansookh kar de) beshak vah khulee baat ko bhee jaanata hai aur chhupe hue ko bhee
aur ham tumako aasaan tareeke kee taufeeq denge
to jahaan tak samajhaana mufeed ho samajhate raho
jo khauph rakhata ho vah to phauree samajh jaega
aur badabakht usase pahaloo tahee karega
jo (qayaamat mein) badee (tez) aag mein daakhil hoga
phir na vahaan marega hee na jeeyega
vah yaqeenan muraad dilee ko pahuncha jo (shirk se) paak ho
aur apane paravaradigaar ka zikr karata aur namaaz padhata raha
magar tum log duniyaavee zindagee ko tarajeeh dete ho
haaloki aakhorat kaheen behatar aur der pa hai
beshak yahee baat agale saheefon
ibaraaheem aur moosa ke saheefon mein bhee hai
bhala tumako dhaanp lene vaalee museebat (qayaamat) ka haal maalum hua hai
us din bahut se chehare zaleel roosava honge
(tauq va janzeer se) mayakqat karane vaale
thake maande dahakatee huee aag mein daakhil honge
unhen ek khaulate hue chashamen ka paanee pilaaya jaega
khaaradaar jhaadee ke siva unake lie koee khaana nahin
jo motaee paida kare na bhookh mein kuchh kaam aaega
(aur) bahut se chehare us din taro taaza honge
apanee koshish (ke nateeje) par shaadamaan
ek aaleeshaan baag mein
vahaan koee lago baat sunenge hee nahin
usamen chashmen jaaree hongen
usamen oonche oonche takht bichhe honge
aur (unake kinaare) gilaas rakhe honge
aur gaanv takie qataar kee qataar lage honge
aur nafees masanade bichhee huee
to kya ye log oont kee tarah gaur nahin karate ki kaisa ajeeb paida kiya gaya hai
aur aasamaan kee taraph ki kya buland banaaya gaya hai
aur pahaadon kee taraf ki kis tarah khade kie gae hain
aur zameen kee taraph ki kis tarah bichhaayee gayee hai
to tum naseehat karate raho tum to bas naseehat karane vaale ho
tum kuchh un par daroga to ho nahin
haan jisane munh pher liya
aur na maana to khuda usako bahut bade azaab kee saza dega
beshak unako hamaaree taraf laut kar aana hai
phir unaka hisaab hamaare zimme hai
subah kee qasam
aur das raaton kee
aur zupht va taaq kee
aur raat kee jab aane lage
aklamand ke vaaste to zaroor badee qasam hai (ki kuphfaar par zaroor azaab hoga)
kya tumane dekha nahin ki tumhaare aad ke saath kya kiya
yaani iram vaale daraaz qad
jinaka misal tamaam (duniya ke) shaharon mein koee paida hee nahin kiya gaya
aur samood ke saath (kya kiya) jo vaadee (qara) mein patthar taraash kar ghar banaate the
aur phiraun ke saath (kya kiya) jo (saza ke lie) mekhe rakhata tha
ye log mukhatalif shaharon mein sarakash ho rahe the
aur unamen bahut se fasaad phaila rakhe the
to tumhaare paravaradigaar ne un par azaab ka koda lagaaya
beshak tumhaara paravaradigaar taak mein hai
lekin insaan jab usako usaka paravaradigaar (is tarah) aazamaata hai ki usako ijzat va neamat deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paravaradigaar ne mujhe ijzat dee hai
magar jab usako (is tarah) aazamaata hai ki us par rozee ko tang kar deta hai bol uthata hai ki mere paravaradigaar ne mujhe zaleel kiya
haragiz nahin balki tum log na yateem kee khaatiradaaree karate ho
aur na mohataaj ko khaana khilaane kee tarageeb dete ho
aur meeraara ke maal (halaal va haraam) ko samet kar chakh jaate ho
aur maal ko bahut hee azeez rakhate ho
sun rakho ki jab zameen koot koot kar reza reza kar dee jaegee
aur tumhaare paravaradigaar ka hukm aur farishte kataar ke kataar aa jaenge
aur us din jahannum saamane kar dee jaegee us din insaan chaunkega magar ab chaunkana kahaan (faayada dega)
(us vakt) qahega ki kaash maine apanee (is) zindagee ke vaaste kuchh pahale bheja hota
to us din khuda aisa azaab karega ki kisee ne vaisa azaab na kiya hoga
aur na koee usake jakadane kee tarah jakadega
(aur kuchh logon se kahega) ai itmenaan paane vaalee jaan
apane paravaradigaar kee taraf chal too usase khush vah tujh se raazee
to mere (khaas) bandon mein shaamil ho ja
aur mere behisht mein daakhil ho ja
mujhe is shahar (makka) kee kasam
aur tum isee shahar mein to rahate ho
aur (tumhaare) baap (aadam) aur usakee aulaad kee qasam
hamane insaan ko mashakqat mein (rahane vaala) paida kiya hai
kya vah ye samajhata hai ki us par koee kaaboo na pa sakega
vah kahata hai ki maine alagaaron maal uda diya
kya vah ye khyaal rakhata hai ki usako kisee ne dekha hee nahin
kya hamane use donon onkhen aur zabaan
aur donon lab nahin die (zaroor die)
aur usako (achchhee buree) donon raahen bhee dikha deen
phir vah ghaatee par se hokar (kyon) nahin guzara
aur tumako kya maaloom ki ghaatee kya hai
kisee (kee) gardan ka (gulaamee ya karj se) chhudaana
ya bhookh ke din rishtedaar yateem ya khaakasaar
mohataaj ko
khaana khilaana
phir to un logon mein (shaamil) ho jaata jo eemaan lae aur sabr kee naseehat aur taras khaane kee vaseeyat karate rahe
yahee log khush naseeb hain

ki unako aag mein daal kar har taraph se band kar diya jaega
sooraj kee qasam aur usakee raushanee kee

phir usakee badakaaree aur parahezagaaree ko use samajha diya
(qasam hai) jisane us (jaan) ko (ganaah se) paak rakha vah to kaamayaab hua
aur jisane use (gunaah karake) daba diya vah naamuraad raha
qaum masood ne apanee sarakashee se (saaleh paigambar ko) jhuthalaaya

magar un logon paigambar ko jhuthalaaya aur usakee koonche kaat daalee to khuda ne unake gunaahon sabab se un par azaab naazil kiya phir (halaak karake) baraabar kar diya

(jannat) ke asabaab muhayya kar denge
aur jisane bukhl kiya, aur beparavaee kee

aur tumhaare vaaste aakherat duniya se yaqeenee kaheen behatar hai
aur tumhaara paravaradigaar anaqareeb is qadar ata karega ki tum khush ho jao

to (haan) pas beshak dushavaaree ke saath hee aasaanee hai
yaqeenan dushvaaree ke saath aasaanee hai
to jab tum phaarig ho jao to muqarrar kar do
aur phir apane paravaradigaar kee taraph ragabat karo
injeer aur zaitoon kee qasam
aur toor seeneen kee
aur us aman vaale shahar (makka) kee
ki hamane insaan bahut achchhe kaide ka paida kiya
phir hamane use (boodha karake raphta raphta) past se past haalat kee taraph pher diya
magar jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam karate rahe unake lie to be inteha ajr va savaab hai
to (ai rasool) in daleelon ke baad tumako (roze) jaza ke baare mein kaun jhuthala sakata hai
kya khuda sabase bada haakim nahin hai (haan zaroor hai)
(ai rasool) apane paravaradigaar ka naam lekar padho jisane har (cheez ko) paida kiya
us ne insaan ko jame hue khoon se paida kiya padho
aur tumhaara paravaradigaar bada qareem hai
jisane qalam ke zarie taaleem dee
useene insaan ko vah baaten bataayeen jinako vah kuchh jaanata hee na tha
sun rakho beshak insaan jo apane ko ganee dekhata hai
to sarakash ho jaata hai
beshak tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph (sabako) palatana hai
bhala tumane us shakhsh ko bhee dekha
jo ek bande ko jab vah namaaz padhata hai to vah rokata hai
bhala dekho to ki agar ye raahe raast par ho ya parahezagaaree ka hukm kare
to rokana kaisa
bhala dekho to ki agar usane (sachche ko) jhuthala diya aur (usane) munh phera
(to nateeja kya hoga) kya usako ye maaloom nahin ki khuda yaqeenan dekh raha hai
dekho agar vah baaz na aaega to ham pareshaanee ke patte pakad ke ghaseetenge
jhoothe khataavaar kee peshaanee ke patte
to vah apane yaaraane jalasa ko bulae ham bhee jallaad farishte ko bulaenge
(ai rasool) dekho haragiz unaka kahana na maanana
aur sajade karate raho aur kurb haasil karo (19) (sajada)
hamane (is kuraan) ko shabe qadr mein naazil (karana shuroo) kiya
aur tumako kya maaloom shabe qadr kya hai
shabe qadr (marataba aur amal mein) hazaar maheeno se behatar hai
is (raat) mein farishte aur jibareel (saal bhar kee) har baat ka hukm lekar apane paravaradigaar ke hukm se naazil hote hain
ye raat subah ke tuloo hone tak (azasarataapa) salaamatee hai
ahale kitaab aur musharikon se jo log kaaphir the jab tak ki unake paas khulee huee daleelen na pahunche vah (apane kuphr se) baaz aane vaale na the
(yaani) khuda ke rasool jo paak auraaq padhate hain (aae aur)
unamen (jo) purazor aur daroost baaten likhee huee hain (sunaaye)
ahale kitaab mutaafarriq hue bhee to jab unake paas khulee huee daleel aa chukee

(tab) aur unhen to bas ye hukm diya gaya tha ki nira khura usee ka etaqaad rakh ke baatil se katara ke khuda kee ibaadat kare aur paabandee se namaaz padhe aur zakaat ada karata rahe aur yahee sachcha deen hai
beshak ahale kitaab aur musharekeen se jo log (ab tak) kaafir hain vah dozakh kee aag mein (honge) hamesha usee mein rahenge yahee log badatareen khalaeq hain
beshak jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe kaam karate rahe yahee log behatareen khalaeq hain

unakee jaza unake paravaradigaar ke yahaan hamesha rahane (sahane) ke baag hain jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain aur vah aabaadul aabaad hamesha usee mein rahenge khuda unase raazee aur vah khuda se khush ye (jaza) khaas us shakhsh kee hai jo apane paravaradigaar se dare
jab zameen bade zoron ke saath zalazale mein aa jaegee
aur zameen apane andar ke bojhe (maadanayaat murde vagairah) nikaal daalegee
aur ek insaan kahega ki usako kya ho gaya hai
us roz vah apane sab haalaat bayaan kar degee
kyonki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne usako hukm diya hoga
us din log giroh giroh (apanee kabron se) nikalenge taaki apane aamaal ko dekhe
to jis shakhs ne zarra baraabar nekee kee vah use dekh lega
aur jis shakhs ne zarra baraabar badee kee hai to use dekh lega
(gaaziyon ke) sarapat daudane vaale ghodo kee qasam
jo nathanon se fararaate lete hain
phir patthar par taap maarakar chingaariyaan nikaalate hain phir subah ko chhaapa maarate hain
(to daud dhoop se) buland kar dete hain
phir us vakt (dushman ke) dil mein ghus jaate hain
(garaz qasam hai) ki beshak insaan apane paravaradigaar ka naashukra hai
aur yaqeenee khuda bhee usase vaaqif hai
aur beshak vah maal ka sakht harees hai
to kya vah ye nahin jaanata ki jab murde qabron se nikaale jaenge
aur dilon ke bhed zaahir kar die jaenge
beshak us din unaka paravaradigaar unase khoob vaaqif hoga
khadakhadaane vaalee
vah khadakhadaane vaalee kya hai
aur tum ko kya maaloom ki vah khadakhadaane vaalee kya hai
jis din log (maidaane hashr mein) tiddiyon kee tarah phaile honge
aur pahaad dhunakee huee rooee ke se ho jaenge
to jisake (nek aamaal) ke palle bhaaree honge
vah man bhaate aish mein honge
aur jinake aamaal ke palle halke honge
to unaka thikaana na raha
aur tumako kya maaloom haaviya kya hai
vah dahakatee huee aag hai
kul va maal kee bahutaayat ne tum logon ko gaafil rakha
yahaan tak ki tum logon ne kabren dekhee (mar gae)
dekho tumako anaqareeb hee maalum ho jaega
phir dekho tumhen anaqareeb hee maaloom ho jaega
dekho agar tumako yaqeenee taur par maaloom hota (to haragiz gaaphil na hote)
tum log zaroor dozakh ko dekhoge
phir tum log yaqeenee dekhana dekhoge
phir tumase neamaton ke baaren zaroor baaz purs kee jaegee
namaaze asr kee qasam
beshak insaan ghaate mein hai
magar jo log eemaan lae, aur achchhe kaam karate rahe aur aapas mein haq ka hukm aur sabr kee vaseeyat karate rahe
har taana dene vaale chugalakhor kee kharaabee hai
jo maal ko jama karata hai aur gin gin kar rakhata hai
vah samajhata hai ki usaka maal use hamesha zinda baaqee rakhega
haragiz nahin vah to zaroor hutama mein daala jaega
aur tumako kya maaloom hatama kya hai
vah khuda kee bhadakaee huee aag hai jo (talave se lagee to) dilon tak chadh jaegee
ye log aag ke lambe sutoono
mein daal kar band kar die
jaenge
ai rasool kya tumane nahin dekha ki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne haathee vaalon ke saath kya kiya
kya usane unakee tamaam tadbeeren galat nahin kar deen (zaroor)
aur un par jhund kee jhund chidiyaan bhej deen
jo un par kharanjon kee kankariyaan phekatee theen
to unhen chabae hue bhoos kee (tabaah) kar diya
choonki quraish ko jaade aur garmee ke safar se maanoos kar diya hai
to unako maanoos kar dene kee vajah se
is ghar (kaaba) ke maalik kee ibaadat karanee chaahie
jisane unako bhookh mein khaana diya aur unako khauf se aman ata kiya
kya tumane us shakhsh ko bhee dekha hai jo roz jaza ko jhuthalaata hai
ye to vahee (kambakht) hai jo yateem ko dhakke deta hai
aur mohataajon ko khilaane ke lie (logon ko) aamaada nahin karata
to un namaaziyon kee tabaahee hai
jo apanee namaaz se gaaphil rahate hain
jo dikhaane ke vaaste karate hain
aur rozamarra kee maaloolee cheezen bhee aariyat nahin dete
(ai rasool) hamanen tumako ko kausar ata kiya
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee namaaz padha karo
aur qurbaanee diya karo beshak tumhaara dushman be aulaad rahega
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki ai kaaphiron
tum jin cheezon ko poojate ho, main unako nahin poojata
aur jis (khuda) kee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat nahin karate
aur jinhen tum poojate ho main unaka poojane vaala nahin
aur jisakee main ibaadat karata hoon usakee tum ibaadat karane vaale nahin
tumhaare lie tumhaara deen mere lie mera deen
ai rasool jab khuda kee madad aa pahanchegee
aur phateh (makka) ho jaegee aur tum logon ko dekhoge ki gol ke gol khuda ke deen mein daakhil ho rahe hain
to tum apane paravaradigaar kee taareef ke saath tasabeeh karana aur usee se magapherat kee dua maangana vah beshak bada maaf karane vaala hai
abu lahab ke haath toot jaen aur vah khud satyaanaas ho jae
(aakhir) na usaka maal hee usake haath aaya aur (na) usane kamaaya
vah bahut bhadakatee huee aag mein daakhil hoga
aur usakee joroo bhee jo sar par eendhan uthae phiratee hai
aur usake gale mein batee huee rassee bandhee hai
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki khuda ek hai
khuda barahaq beniyaaz hai
na usane kisee ko jana na usako kisee ne jana
aur usaka koee hamasar nahin
(ai rasool) tum kah do ki main subah ke maalik kee
har cheez kee buraee se jo usane paida kee panaah maangata hoon
aur andhereeraat kee buraee se jab usaka andhera chha jae
aur gandon par phoonkane vaaliyon kee buraee se
(jab phoonke) aur hasad karane vaale kee buraee se
(ai rasool) tum kah do main logon ke paravaradigaar
logon ke baadashaah
logon ke maabood kee (shaitaanee)
vasavase kee buraee se panaah maangata hoon
jo (khuda ke naam se) peechhe hat jaata hai jo logon ke dilon mein vasavase daala karata hai
jinnaat mein se khvaah aadamiyon mein se
